features.name: Annual income
features.description: The self-reported annual income provided by the borrower during registration.

features.name: loan_amnt
features.description: The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower. If at some point in time, the credit department reduces the loan amount, then it will be reflected in this value.

features.name: term
features.description: The number of payments on the loan. Values are in months and can be either 36 or 60.

features.name: installment
features.description: The monthly payment owed by the borrower if the loan originates.

features.name: emp_length
features.description: Employment length in years. Possible values are between 0 and 10 where 0 means less than one year and 10 means ten or more years.

features.name: home_ownership
features.description: The home ownership status provided by the borrower during registration or obtained from the credit report. Our values are: RENT, OWN, MORTGAGE, OTHER

features.name: verification_status
features.description: Indicates if income was verified by LC, not verified, or if the income source was verified

features.name: pymnt_plan
features.description: Indicates if a payment plan has been put in place for the loan
